name: Stay in the circle
description:
This game was made for the 20 seconds game jam.

Game modes

The challenge mode has the intended experience. Try to beat it!

The personalized mode let you play the way you want. It's your choice to make it easier or harder.

Tips to beat challenge mode

The circle changes its direction randomly every time it bounces. But it's not completly random. If the circle is at the right of the screen, it will choose a new direction to the left. If it's at the left, goes to the right. Same for up and down. You can try to predict where the circle will go.
